Posts.Content: Hi I ended up using winter tights cut to fit. Could get some great colours and very comfortable.
Posts.Title: Pic line covers

Posts.Content: I hope you find a manageable routine once you start. If you have some idea of what to expect when, it does help I found. I also come across a charity called Heather's Hair (www.heathershair.co.uk) provide human hair weaves on a sweat band  or covered Alice band to wear under a hat or scarf. I found my wig had just too much hair as my own was pretty thin before any of this however my HH weave was amazing. Most people didn't even know it wasn't my own hair included my chemo nurses. WIshing you all the best.
Posts.Title: Chemotherapy and hair loss
